hard_constraints.description: Every item needs a home, and only one home. No double-dipping.
Sanity check: make sure the total weight in a bin doesn't blow past the capacity limit.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- item(B, _), #sum{ W, I : assign(I, B), item(I, W) } > n.

soft_constraints.description: We want to be stingy with our resources, so mark whenever a bin is actually being used.

global_objective: #minimize { Cost, Name, ID : penalty(Name, ID, Cost) }.
